Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 5th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 1988...
Released by Cincinnati on 3/2/1988...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis on 3/2/1988 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 4/22/1991 with a Stress Fractured Ulna, out for 2 weeks...
Injured on 5/22/1991 with a Sore Knee, out for one week...
Injured on 4/19/1992 with a Torn Groin Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Had first career hit on 5/12/1993, off Andy Ashby (NYM)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/7/1993, off Tim Crews (LA)...
Won World Series with St. Louis in 1993...
